item.title: Tips to Plan your next Vacation
item.description: How to create your own Itinerary & plan your next trip The key to travel is Plan Plan Plan. Yes there are spontaneous people our there and that’s great if it works for you, but if your trying to travel on a budget then planning is the best way to go. I’m going to share with you some tips and tricks we use when traveling.
